name: dmresexg
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: syl5eqel(cdm(cres(c2, c0)), universe, cin(c0, cdm(c2)), wcel(c0, c1))
stmt.pretty: syl5eqel(dom((c2 |` c0)), universe, (c0 ⋂ dom(c2)), c0 ∈ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cdm(cres(c2, c0)), universe))
-| wceq(cdm(cres(c2, c0)), cin(c0, cdm(c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cin(c0, cdm(c2)), universe))

cumulated.origin:
